snippet: CBS is examining various options as traditional radio tries to compete with online services like Pandora and Spotify.
abstract: CBS Corp announces it will seek to sell its radio business; chief executive Leslie Moonves has suggested for years that company will reduce its radio holdings, but question has been raised about who would be willing to buy radio business in light of decline in market.
lead_paragraph: CBS is examining various options as traditional radio tries to compete with online services like Pandora and Spotify.

headline.main: CBS Looks to Exit Radio Business
headline.print_headline: CBS Says It Will Sell Its Radio Business to Focus on Digital
